About.

I LIKE TO DABBLE IN DESIGN AND FULLSTACK DEVELOPMENT.

I come from a humanities background and I've had the opportunity to do work in Education, publishing, and QA testing. However, I find that my penchant for development and affinity for technology take center stage â€“ It is the feeling of not knowing, and the drive to chase that unknown that fuels me everyday. This is something I find in the work I do in software development, it is what keeps me on my toes, and keeps me looking forward to the next day, where I can work on that same problem until its perfect.

I am the current lead developer at SploreGuide, a FullStack Academy Graduate, and former QA Engineer looking for my next challenge in Software Development
